title: Clinical Practical Skill Enhancement: Consensus-Oriented Peer Discussion Instructional Design Strategy for Early Elementary Grades

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain four core design principles of consensus-oriented discussion lessons for first-grade elementary students
Learners can analyze four types of consensus reasoning patterns that emerge during discussions and propose appropriate instructional strategies
Instructional designers can develop and receive peer feedback on an explicit teaching model (10-minute duration) applicable in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
